structure.description: Root app shell for SaaS dashboard. Provides grid-based layout with fixed header, collapsible sidebar, and scrollable main. Consumes global data: user, notifications, navigationItems, kpis, charts, transactions, quickActions, appSettings.
structure.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Fixed top app bar with brand, global search, and user actions. Requires brand {logoUrl,name}, searchIndex suggestions, notifications[], user profile data.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI AppBar examples with navigation patterns, active states, and responsive behavior. Include examples for different menu structures and styling. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.

children.description: Left cluster: brand logo linking to home.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Company logo image. Needs brand.logoUrl and alt text brand.name.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Avatar examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Clickable brand link to route '/'.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI ReactLink examples with navigation patterns, active states, and responsive behavior. Include examples for different menu structures and styling. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.

children.description: Center cluster: global search with autocomplete and keyboard shortcut '/' to focus. Debounced queries to searchIndex.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Search input with autocomplete dropdown of entities (users, invoices). Needs searchIndex endpoint; returns [{label, type, id, route}].
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI AutoComplete or ComboBox examples for a global search bar with async remote filtering, keyboard shortcut focus ('/'), and custom item templates (type icon + label + route). Include props for debounce, loading indicator, no-data template, and ARIA best practices. Provide styling for dense header usage and dark mode.

children.description: Right cluster: actions area including notifications, help menu, theme toggle, and user menu.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Notifications icon button with unread badge count from notifications[]. Opens popover list.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Button + Badge + Popover/Popup examples for a notifications bell with dynamic count, click to open list, keyboard navigation, and close on outside click. Include examples for lazy loading, infinite scroll list inside, and mark-all-read action.

children.description: Notifications popover listing latest notifications with timestamps and read state. Data: notifications[{id,type,message,createdAt,read}].
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI ListView inside a Popup with virtual scrolling and item templates (icon by type, message, relative time, read indicator). Include actions per item and 'Mark all as read' button.

children.description: Scrollable list of notification items; supports virtual, skeleton on loading, empty state.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI ListView examples with data binding, sorting, filtering, and pagination. Include examples with realistic sample data, custom cell templates, and responsive design. Provide complete implementation with all necessary props.

children.description: Mark all as read action; triggers mutation and toast.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Button examples with complete props, event handlers, validation, and styling. Include examples for different states (enabled, disabled, error) and common use cases. Provide realistic sample data and accessibility attributes.

children.description: Help icon button opening menu (Docs, Contact).
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Menu or ContextMenu attached to an icon button with items (Docs, Contact). Include keyboard navigation and positioning in a header.

children.description: Theme toggle (light/dark). Updates appSettings.theme.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Switch examples for theme toggling with custom icons (sun/moon), ARIA labels, and onChange integration for global theme.

children.description: User menu trigger showing avatar and name; opens menu with Profile, Settings, Sign out. Needs user {name, avatarUrl, role}.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI DropDownButton or MenuButton with custom button (avatar + name) and menu items (Profile, Settings, Sign out). Include placement control and responsive behavior for narrow headers.

children.description: User avatar image (user.avatarUrl) with fallback initials.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Avatar usage with image + fallback initials, sizes suitable for app bar, and status dot support.

children.description: App body wrapper with sidebar and main content region. Uses responsive grid; sidebar collapsible to rail.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Collapsible navigation sidebar with sections and nested items. Data: navigationItems[{id,label,icon,route,children?}]. Remembers collapsed state per user.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Drawer examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Hamburger toggle to collapse/expand sidebar; shows tooltips when collapsed.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Button (icon-only) examples for toggling a Drawer, including aria-expanded state and tooltip integration.

children.description: Navigation Drawer with selectable items, active route highlight, and mini-rail mode.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Drawer examples for collapsible side navigation with item icons, nested items, and mini mode. Include controlled state, routing integration, and tooltips for collapsed items.

children.description: Nav list bound to navigationItems; supports submenu expand/collapse and badges.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI PanelBar or TreeView for hierarchical navigation with icons, route data, and selection persistence.

children.description: Primary scrollable content area with spacing and sections per plan.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Breadcrumbs reflecting routeContext.segments and page title.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Breadcrumb examples with custom separators, responsive collapse, and integration with router links.

children.description: Page header row with title and secondary actions.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Page title from routeContext.title (e.g., Dashboard).
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Typography examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Secondary actions: Export and Refresh.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI ToolBar with buttons (Export CSV, Refresh) and responsive overflow.

children.description: Export data (KPIs, charts, transactions) to CSV/PNG; triggers server export.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Button with dropdown SplitButton for export formats (CSV, PNG, PDF). Include loading state and success toast.

children.description: Refresh all data; invalidates queries; shows spinner while loading.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Button with loading indicator/spinner and tooltip for Refresh action.

children.description: Filters toolbar controlling dashboards. Data: filters {search,dateRange,status[],method}.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Form in toolbar layout with compact spacing and controlled fields; include validation and reset/apply pattern.

children.description: Date range picker with presets (7D, 30D, QTD, YTD, Custom). Updates KPIs, charts, table.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI DateRangePicker examples with predefined ranges, custom footer (Apply/Cancel), and timezone handling.

children.description: Status filter (Paid, Pending, Failed, Refunded).
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI MultiSelect with checkbox items, tag mode compact, and clear button in a toolbar.

children.description: Payment method select (Card, Bank, PayPal, Cash).
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI DropDownList examples with option labels, filtering, and small size styling.

children.description: Search transactions/users; debounced; placeholder 'Search…'.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI TextBox with built-in clear button and onChange debounce pattern for search within a toolbar.

children.description: Apply filters; primary styling.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Button (primary) examples in a toolbar with form submit handling.

children.description: Reset filters to defaults.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Button (secondary) with tooltip 'Reset filters' and clear icon.

children.description: KPI Metrics Grid displaying key metrics as cards with shadows and mini sparklines. Data: kpis[], sparklineSeries per KPI.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Card examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Responsive grid 2–4 columns with gap 16–24px.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Grid examples with data binding, sorting, filtering, and pagination. Include examples with realistic sample data, custom cell templates, and responsive design. Provide complete implementation with all necessary props.

children.description: KPI card template repeated for each kpi. Shows title, value, delta, unit, tooltip, and sparkline. Data: kpi {label,value,delta,trend,unit,tooltip}, series [{date,value}].
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Card with header/body and elevation, including a small inline Sparkline chart. Include positive/negative delta styling with icons and tooltip for metric definition.

children.description: Metric label from kpi.label.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Typography examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Value row with big number and unit; delta badge with arrow up/down based on kpi.trend.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Formatted value with locale/currency when applicable.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Typography examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Delta indicator with success/danger styling; shows kpi.delta%.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Badge usage for success/danger variants with icons and compact size.

children.description: Hover tooltip explaining metric definition from kpi.tooltip.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Tooltip applied to a card with custom content.

children.description: Mini trend chart for the KPI using series data.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Sparkline examples for inline KPI trends with area/line styles and minimal axes.

children.description: Charts Section with tabs for granularity (D/W/M/Q) and two chart cards: Revenue and User Growth. Data: charts.revenueSeries, charts.userGrowthSeries, chartMeta.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Card examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Switch chart granularity; updates both charts in sync. Uses chartMeta.granularity.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI TabStrip examples with controlled selection and onSelect to refetch chart data; include responsive collapse to dropdown on small screens.

children.description: Daily granularity.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI TabStrip examples with navigation patterns, active states, and responsive behavior. Include examples for different menu structures and styling. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.

children.description: Weekly granularity.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI TabStrip examples with navigation patterns, active states, and responsive behavior. Include examples for different menu structures and styling. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.

children.description: Revenue chart card with controls (download CSV/PNG).

children.description: Revenue over time with currency from chartMeta.currency.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Typography examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Interactive revenue series chart; supports hover tooltip, zoom/pan, brush range, legend toggle. Data: charts.revenueSeries[{date,value}].
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Chart (Line/Area) configured for time series with date axis, tooltips, crosshair, pannable/zoomable, and series aggregation by granularity.

children.description: Chart actions: Download, CSV.

metadata.description: A comprehensive SaaS dashboard ACT with fixed header, collapsible sidebar, KPIs, charts, transactions table, FAB with quick actions, modals, drawer, and global feedback. Includes detailed mcpQuery fields for mapping to Kendo UI components.
